entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Haliburton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:21 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
